# requestedBalanceType

**Instance Property**

The balance type requested by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var requestedBalanceType: INBalanceType { get }
```

## Discussion

If this property contains a value other than [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBalanceType/unknown], use the value to retrieve the balance associated with the specified account. Include the balance information in your response object.

## Getting the Search Attributes

- **accountNickname**: The nickname that the user assigned to the account.
- **accountType**: The type of the account.
- **organizationName**: The name of an organization attached to the account.
- **INBalanceType**: Constants indicating the meaning of a balance.
